tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
 patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 diagnosis TEXT,
 treatment_plan TEXT,
 last_visit_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Oncologists (
  oncologist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialization VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Oncologists (
  oncologist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  oncologist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  hospital VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  oncologist_id UUID REFERENCES Oncologists(oncologist_id),
  record_date DATE,
  treatment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    patient_age INT,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    last_visit DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    oncologist_id INT,
    visit_date DATE,
    prescription TEXT,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    oncologist_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    appointment_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  oncologist_id INT REFERENCES Oncologists(oncologist_id),
  appointment_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalReports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  oncologist_id INT REFERENCES Oncologists(oncologist_id),
  report_date DATE,
  report_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT REFERENCES MedicalReports(report_id),
  medication VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  frequency VARCHAR(20)
);
